## blockRendering.MarkerSvg.showWithStack\_() method

Position and display the marker for a stack. This is a box with extra padding around the entire stack of blocks.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected showWithStack_(curNode: ASTNode): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  curNode | [ASTNode](./blockly.astnode.md) | The node to draw the marker for. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
